short_summary: Supply and Delivery of Eastern White Cedar Shingles
description: Through a competitive open bidding process, Parks Canada is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of thick cut Air-dried (green) eastern white cedar shingles. Delivery is expected to be completed by March 17, 2023.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Supply and Delivery of Eastern White Cedar Shingles

#### Notice Reference
WS3792110498-Doc3799121784

#### Posting Date
December 23, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
January 19, 2023, 2:00 pm EST

#### Amendment Details
Amendment 2

#### Background
Parks Canada requires the supply and delivery of thick cut, air-dried (green) eastern white cedar shingles by March 17, 2023.

#### Deliverables
The recipient of the contract will be required to deliver  the shingles to the Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site, located at 5925 Main Street, Provincial Trunk Highway 9, St. Andrews, MB, R1A 4A8.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the contractor.

#### Contact Information
Shelley Unser
Technical Purchase Advisor
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
Phone: None
Email: [shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Important Notice
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Trade Agreements notes are applicable to this tender.

#### Additional Details
- UNSPSC code: 30151508 (Shingles)
- Procurement Category: Goods
- Procurement Method: Competitive open bidding
- Regions of Opportunity: Manitoba
- Regions of Delivery: Manitoba
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) [1]

Please visit the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Canada Buy posting closing time for more information.
